title: NJ.com preseason boys volleyball Top 20: Welcome back to spring volleyball
body: Kearny boys volleyball player Santiago Lopez on Friday, April 16, 2021. (Reena Rose Sibayan | The Jersey Journal)It’s been a long wait, but boys volleyball has finally made its return!There’s a long road ahead to the end of the season in June and that journey begins today.With each new season comes a preseason ranking.Without further ado, here is the preseason NJ.com Top 20 for the 2021 boys volleyball season.Get the .Brian Bobal may be reached at . Follow Brian on Twitter  and on Instagram . Like  High School Sports on .Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
